mapper.insert: insert into corp_mem(corp_id, corp_pw, corp_name, corp_type, corp_email, epr_No, corp_address) values (#{corp_id}, #{corp_pw}, #{corp_name}, #{corp_type}, #{corp_email}, #{epr_No}, #{corp_address})
mapper.select: select corp_pw from corp_mem where corp_id=#{corp_id}
select corp_id from corp_mem where corp_id=#{corp_id}
